key.name: filename
key.summary: The filename to write to the USB disks
key.description: The filename of the ISO image to write to the connected USB disks.

key.name: max-threads
key.summary: The maximum number of threads to use
key.description: The maximum number of parallel threads to use when copying data.

key.name: blank-drive
key.description: Write the ISO to the drive and then blank the remainder of the drive.

key.name: enable-verify
key.summary: Verify the ISO image was written correctly
key.description: Read and verify the ISO image from each device after writing is complete.

key.name: enable-probe
key.summary: Inspect the device before writing images
key.description: Inspect the device to verify the reported device size is the actual media size.

key.name: show-warning
key.summary: Show a warning before writing to a drive
key.description: Show a warning dialog confirming that the device contents are to be erased.
